title: IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 - Apply Online for Junior Technical Superintendent Post
description: Indian Institute of Technology Indore (IIT Indore) has declared the official notification for 2025. To fill up the vacancies for Junior Technical Superintendent Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the B.E/ B.Tech, M.Sc., and MCA can grab this chance and apply for the IIT Indore Recruitment 2025 . Here, we include the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates can apply online...
